name: Basic Horoscope and Numerology
description: Vedic Rishi Free APIs for Basic Astrological and Horoscope Details along with numerous Numerological details. It also provides panchang or hindu/indian calendar details.

utterances.utterance: Can you give me a detailed numerology report?
I would like to know my numerology details.
Please provide a comprehensive numerology report.
What does my numerology report say?
Could you share my numerology details?
I need a full numerology report.
Tell me about my numerology.
Can you show me my numerology report?
I'd like to see my numerology details.
Give me a detailed report on my numerology.

api_methods.name: Birth Details
api_methods.description: Along with birth details it provides sunrise, sunset, ayanamsha as well.

I'd like to know the sunrise and sunset times.

Provide me with the panchang details for today.

I need the basic horoscope details for today.
What's the hindu calendar information for today?
Give me the sunrise and sunset information.
I'd like to know today's astrological and numerological details.
Can you provide the basic astrological details?

api_methods.name: Basic Astrological Details
api_methods.description: Provides the complete avakahada details e.g. nakshtatra, charan, tithi, karan, yog ,varna, vashaya, yoni, etc

Tell me about my yoni and other horoscope details.

api_methods.name: Basic panchang details at the time of sunrise
api_methods.description: Provides data points for panchang elements, chaugadiya and sunrise and set time at he time of  sunrise.

utterances.utterance: Can you give me the panchang details for sunrise today?

Can you tell me the panchang for the sunrise on Christmas?
I want to know the panchang details for the sunrise on the 1st of January.
Give me the panchang details for the sunrise on the summer solstice.

api_methods.name: Basic panchang details
api_methods.description: Provides data points for panchang elements, and sunrise and set timings.

utterances.utterance: Can you give me today's panchang details?
